channel.title: Computer totaly messed up :( help
channel.description: hi, i need you to help me please paying 4$ to best answerer i promise. one day i searched runescape3 beta on youtube. it said that there was a download link for beta testing. it was a exe file and it needed less then one second to download, i ran it. suddenly my computer totaly shutdown! whenever i load my computer it freezez when its loading windows. If someone can help me, and it acctualy worked. i am paying you 20$ for your paypal. reply your paypal account and how to do it, WHEN IT WORKS ILL PAY.

item.title: Computer totaly messed up :( help
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:15, topic:315810”]And with this comes a warning. RUNESCAPE 3 DOES NOT EXIST! It is just a bunch of idiots who want to put viruses onto people’s computers. This person had to learn the hard way, unfortunately.

DON’T FALL FOR IT![/quote]
I know :/, Thanks for the warning.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2009, 07:04:54 am[/size][hr]IS THERE A POSSIBLE WAY TO FIX IT WITHOUT REFORMATTING IT HELP!
SORRY ABOUT THE CAPS THOUGH LOL.

item.title: Computer totaly messed up :( help
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:13, topic:315810”][quote author=i noob iii link=topic=412263.msg3039339#msg3039339 date=1258998116]

@offtopic my mom got same problem and she is wondering how to get into safe modus?

press f8 after bios started
(b4 you get the windows loading screen)
[/quote]

thx

[quote]Thanks guys your the best, my mum would kill me if she found out this happend, lol.
Doesnt anyone have like a better way :S!
God damn hacker!
[/quote]
yeah im glad you found out off it my mom would kill me to if she found out this happened to me :)[/quote]
true
the problem is i have to now pay from my own money to fix the computer.
Thanks

item.title: Computer totaly messed up :( help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

The easiest way for you to solve this is to turn on your pc in safe mode, and put everything of importance on a cd(Such as your server files).

After that there’s a few things you can do. You can:
Bring it to an expert. Wich will cost you alot more than 20$(per hour).
Allow someone to go into your pc by remote access, and do it for you.
Or, reinstall your OS.

Read full topic

item.description:

try going in safe mode,
or take your computer to a shop where they can fix it or something.
there wont be alot of help coming from here since u cant really do this remotely or anything,
anyway goodluck.

Read full topic
